speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: SCENE VIII. Another part of the plains.

speaker: MARGARELON
text_entry: Enter HECTOR

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Most putrefied core, so fair without,

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Thy goodly armour thus hath cost thy life.

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Now is my day's work done; I'll take good breath:

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Rest, sword; thou hast thy fill of blood and death.

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Puts off his helmet and hangs his shield behind him

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: Enter ACHILLES and Myrmidons

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Look, Hector, how the sun begins to set;

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: How ugly night comes breathing at his heels:

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Even with the vail and darking of the sun,

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: To close the day up, Hector's life is done.

speaker: HECTOR
text_entry: I am unarm'd; forego this vantage, Greek.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Strike, fellows, strike; this is the man I seek.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: HECTOR falls

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: So, Ilion, fall thou next! now, Troy, sink down!

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Here lies thy heart, thy sinews, and thy bone.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: On, Myrmidons, and cry you all amain,

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: 'Achilles hath the mighty Hector slain.'

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: A retreat sounded

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Hark! a retire upon our Grecian part.

speaker: MYRMIDONS
text_entry: The Trojan trumpets sound the like, my lord.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: The dragon wing of night o'erspreads the earth,

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: And, stickler-like, the armies separates.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: My half-supp'd sword, that frankly would have fed,

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Pleased with this dainty bait, thus goes to bed.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Sheathes his sword

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Come, tie his body to my horse's tail;

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Along the field I will the Trojan trail.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Exeunt
